text: Jessica Tandy (June 7, 1909 â€“ September 11, 1994) was an English-American actress. She was born in Hackney, London. She starred in many movies during her career, including Cocoon (1985), Driving Miss Daisy (1989), and Fried Green Tomatoes (1991). She won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her role in Driving Miss Daisy. Tandy died of ovarian cancer in Easton, Connecticut. == Other websites == * Category:1909 births Category:1994 deaths Category:English Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from London Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:British radio actors Category:Cancer deaths in Connecticut Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Emmy Award winners Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Jessica Tandy
